ComicInfo.Summary:
OMEGA HULK HAS OFFICIALLY BOUGHT A TICKET TO HELL...
DOC GREEN sets his sights on LYRA…A.K.A. THE SAVAGE SHE-HULK FROM THUNDRA’S FUTURE!!!
Science runs amok!
Mistakes will be made!
No happy ending here!
